title: Ticket #5399: HTCondor View: Add download option for chart
description:
It should be possible to download a CSV of the data displayed in the graph.

  1. Move the existing download link used in the paired graph/table into the hover options.

  2. Ensure it's hooked up in all cases

  3. Add some sort of timeout warning? Timeline series data had a good chance to break the Javascript time limit; would be good to give a better error. Other possibility: teach it to break into multiple parts.
remarks:
2015-Nov-16 16:03:41 by adesmet:
Implemented. Both table and chart have a little edit menu now, with options for full screen, download data, and edit.
check_ins: 2015-Nov-16 16:02   Check-in [47925]: Can download chart and table now. #5399 (By Alan De Smet )
creator: adesmet
